name: Pandora's Magical Cafe
description:
Looking for a taste of magic? Let's visit Pandora's Magical Cafe! 

Help her improve her store, serve the - sometimes strange - customers and expand her menu with the power of magic (and hard work!)

   Instructions  

  1. Use the arrow keys on your keyboard to move around the cafeteria.
  2. Customers shall arrive and order food.
  3. Head to a food spot (e.g. coffee pot) and press Space, then select the food you want with the arrows keys and hit Space again.
  4. Wait for it to be ready! Magic can't be rushed.
  5. Then go to the customer and deliver the order with Space.
  6. If you got the order right, you will be paid!
  7. Serve as much customers  as you can before the day finishes at 9PM.
  8. Once in the shop screen use your mouse to scroll the options and buy new furniture for your store.
  9. Rinse and repeat!

A game by Smarto Club. Thanks for playing! Gameplay video.
